column1: ==History==
column2: ==History==

column1: Blackjack's precursor was twenty-one, a game of unknown origin.
column2: Twenty-one, a game of unknown origin, became regarded as a predecessor to Blackjack.

column1: The first written reference is found in a book by the Spanish author Miguel de Cervantes, most famous for writing Don Quixote.

column1: In the modern game, a blackjack refers to any hand of an ace plus a ten or face card, regardless of suits or colours.
column2: In the modern game, any hand of an ace plus a ten or face card, regardless of suits or colours, operates as the eponymous blackjack.

column1: ==Rules of play at casinos==
column2: ==Rules of play at casinos==

column1: At a casino blackjack table, the dealer faces five to seven playing positions from behind a semicircular table.
column2: At a casino blackjack table, the dealer agrees to face five to seven playing positions from behind a semicircular table.

column1: Between one and eight standard 52-card decks are shuffled together.
column2: The shuffling involves one to eight standard 52-card decks.

column1: At the beginning of each round, up to three players place their bets in the "betting box" at each position in play.
column2: At the beginning of each round, up to three players need to place their bets in the "betting box" at each position in play.

column1: The player whose bet is at the front of the betting box is deemed to have control over the position,
column2: The player whose bet is at the front of the betting box has control over the position,

column1: and the dealer will consult the controlling player for playing decisions regarding the hand;
column2: and the dealer will consult the controlling player for playing decisions regarding the hand;

column1: the other players of that box are said to "play behind".
column2: the other players of that box are said to "play behind".
